sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard deck of 52 cards in a single draw?
message_2:
There is only one King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing the King of Hearts in a single draw is 1 (the number of King of Hearts) divided by 52 (the total number of cards in the deck).
